USBConnectionEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The USBConnectionEvent interface of the is the event type passed to USB and events when the user agent detects that a new USB device has been connected or disconnected.

USBConnectionEventUSBConnectionEvent.summary:
NOTE Experimental The USBConnectionEvent() constructor creates a new object.
This constructor is not typically used,
it is created by the browser in response to the connection and disconnection of a USB device.

USBConnectionEventDevice.summary: NOTE Experimental The device read-only property of the interface returns a object representing the device being connected or disconnected.
